name: Chomper
description:
• Move with the arrow keys
  • Eat the meat. Don't eat the farts. Get a good score.
  • Avoid spikes. They build up with each step.

(These are also practical bits of advice for real life)

Chomper is an idea I had a while ago for a sort of pacman-like puzzle game, but with a farting dinosaur. Originally planned for mobile (hence the vertical aspect ration), I've kept this demo private for a while, but I've decided to make it public and let everyone play it.

It's not perfect, and I know there's some bugs, but I enjoyed working on it. Hopefully you'll enjoy playing it for a few minutes or so. Perhaps sometime in the future I'll come back to this flatulent little beast.

--

Music graciously provided by Paws Menu
